name: Battle Turtles
description:
Battle Turtles is a modern fighting game featuring turtles, cool weapons, interesting maps, and more!

THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT AND LIKELY CAN HAVE MANY BUGS! PLEASE REPORT THEM IN THE COMMENTS BELOW!

------------------------

Features:

  • Multiplayer fighting (up to 4 players)
  • 7+ maps
  • Weapons and power-ups
  • Original soundtrack
  • Turtles.

------------------------

Controls (Tutorial coming in 1.1):

Xbox controller button layout:

Left stick - Move

A - Attack

B - Use weapon

X - Jump

------------------------

Credits:

Programming - Nathcra

Art / 3d Models - Nathcra

Audio - SFX from https://mixkit.co/. Music made in Garage Band.

Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Koulen

This game was proudly made using the Godot Engine.

Godot Engine:  https://godotengine.org/

Blender: https://www.blender.org/

------------------------
